forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. North wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As the day dawns over Downtown San Francisco, the sky is painted in clear, gentle hues, free from the customary fog that tends to cling to the coastal hills. With the sun rising over the Golden Gate Bridge, the city awakens to temperatures gently hovering in the mid-60s, a cozy embrace that will gradually retreat to the cooler touch of late afternoon. A soft northwestern breeze whispers through the streets at around six miles per hour, cooling the air just enough to invite a light jacket or sweater for comfort.

The day offers a beautiful opportunity to explore the neighborhoods, where the clarity of the air makes the vibrant colors of the city’s architecture stand out with delightful vibrancy. It might be an ideal time to stroll along the Embarcadero, savoring the picturesque waterfront views, or perhaps to gather with friends at a local café, where the gentle sun casts a warm glow over steaming cups of coffee. As evening approaches, the temperatures will dip to a refreshingly brisk 49 degrees, beckoning for a cozy end to a lovely day—a perfect occasion to gather by a bonfire or indulge in the warmth of cherished company.
